title: The Vikings Land Kirk Cousins, the Bears Add Firepower, and the Saints Keep Their Quarterback | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 244)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Kevin Clark break down the news of Kirk Cousins going to Minnesota (03:00), Case Keenum signing with the Broncos (13:15), Chicago adding Allen Robinson (20:00), Drew Brees staying in New Orleans (35:00), and more from around the league.

Read our NFL free-agency coverage here: https://www.theringer.com/nfl


      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
